page.description: Returns whether or not the List has unsynchronzed edits (eg, is dirty.)

discussion.p: Returns true if the List is dirty (i.e. has unsynchronzed edits.) If the List does not have a Detail View, *[js:listIsDirty]* will always return false.
A typical use case for this method is to test if the List is dirty before doing a refresh of the data (before using the *[js:{dialog.object}.refreshListData()]* method.)
